abstract: A two-hour edition of “So You Think You Can Dance” lifted Fox to No. 1 in the ratings on Wednesday, with 8.8 million viewers tuning in from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: A two-hour edition of “So You Think You Can Dance” lifted Fox to No. 1 in the ratings on Wednesday, with 8.8 million viewers tuning in from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Another Night, Another Fox/CBS Ratings Slugfest
